name: SCP 432 - Into The Maze
description:
SCP 432 is a standard steel storage cabinet. Its abnormal properties become evident when it is opened. SCP 432 leads to a large labyrinth composed of various industrial environments. Explorations have revealed the presence of a large predatory species residing in the maze. 

As a D class, your assignment is to explore and document the maze. Attempt to find a way out (we want our camera back).  You can drop glowsticks (G) to mark your path. Press the right mouse button to zoom your camera and press again to return to the default view. 

Remember, you a not alone in there. Listen carefully and watch your back.
